title: Define Comprehensive Project Requirements for NeuroProstheticLimbController - Revised
description: Create a detailed and comprehensive document outlining the functional and non-functional requirements for the NeuroProstheticLimbController. The document should clearly define user needs, system constraints, performance expectations, security considerations, interface design, and provide detailed sections for each major component of the system (e.g., BCI hardware, software algorithms, prosthetic limb control). The document will serve as a foundation for the project's development. The requirements document should be structured to allow easy understanding and adaptability as the project progresses. Consider adding specific metrics for each requirement where applicable, and provide examples or use cases to aid in understanding. Also, include any relevant standards or regulations that should be followed during the development process, such as ISO 13485:2016 - Medical devices – Quality management systems – Requirements for regulatory purposes. To ensure comprehensive coverage, it would be beneficial to consult with subject matter experts (SMEs) in areas such as BCI, prosthetics, and human-computer interaction. The revised requirements document will be submitted to the project manager for approval upon completion.

title: Design BCI System Architecture
description: Create a detailed architecture for the Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) system, including hardware and software components.

title: Develop Frontend for BCI Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the BCI system, allowing users to interact with their prosthetic limb.

title: Implement Backend Processing Logic
description: Create the backend logic responsible for processing signals from the BCI system and controlling the prosthetic limb.

title: Integrate Hardware Components
description: Connect and integrate the necessary hardware components into the NeuroProstheticLimbController system.

title: Test and Validate BCI System
description: Perform thorough testing of the BCI system to ensure proper functionality and user safety.

title: Document System Design and Implementation
description: Write clear, concise documentation detailing the design and implementation of the NeuroProstheticLimbController.
